text: Paris-Dakar Rally is a video game for PlayStation 2 and Windows. It is based on the real-life Paris Dakar Rally – one of the world's most difficult and dangerous sporting events. Based on the 2000 running of the rally, the game features ten locations (each containing four stages) beginning in Senegal and ending in Wadi Elrayan, Egypt. ==Reception== The game received negative reviews. ==References== Category:2001 video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Rally racing video games Category:Sports video games set in France Category:Video games set in Paris Category:Video games set in Africa Category:Video games developed in the United Kingdom Category:Windows games
title: Paris-Dakar Rally (video game)
